# Websites

[A Scientific Review of Wild Edible Plants from the Levant](https://pgomba.github.io/Levantine_WEPs/). Data summary of 414 Levantine taxa with edible records in the scientific literature

[Árboles autóctonos de la República Dominicana: Conservación de semillas y propagación para una reforestación sustentable](https://pgomba.github.io/arbolesRD/). Online book with technical information and images of important native trees from the Dominican Republic \[Spanish\]
